 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָצוֺד‎</span>] **noun masculine** in plural, dubious, usually ==siege-works==; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצוֺדִים נְּדֹלִים‎</span> [[Eccl.9.14|Eccl 9:14]], but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצוּרִים‎</span> [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>Altor. Forsch. iv. 353</sup>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָצוֺר‎</span> **2**, p. 849 a. 

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָצוֺד‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==hunting implement==, specifically ==net== (compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצַדְתָּא‎</span>, ***net)***; — only figurative: construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצוֺד רָעִים‎</span> [[Prov.12.12|Prov 12:12]] (but text dubious, see conjecture in Toy); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצוּדוֺ‎</span> [[Job.19.5|Job 19:5]] (of God as Job's hunter); plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצוֺדִים וַחֲרָמִים לִנָּהּ‎</span> [[Eccl.7.26|Eccl 7:26]] (of woman). 

<small>Also see: [[H4679]]</small>

 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצוֺדָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==net==; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Eccl.9.12|Eccl 9:12]] for fish (in simile); — plural [[Ezek.19.9|Ezek 19:9]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצָד‎</span> above 

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצוֺדָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==fastness, stronghold==; — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצֹדָתָהּ‎</span> [[Isa.29.7|Isa 29:7]] (of Ariel); — plural [[Ezek.19.9|Ezek 19:9]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצָד‎</span>.
